name: Multiple polling place sites
text: (a)  The chief election officer may establish multiple polling place sites for contiguous precincts, notwithstanding district boundaries, when it is convenient and readily accessible for the voters of the precincts involved. 	(b)  No multiple polling place site shall be established later than 4:30 p.m. on the tenth day prior to the close of filing for an election. [L 1983, c 34, §10; am L 1984, c 39, §2]
